review_data.title: Very Long wait for an average Pizza

review_data.title: Unforgettable Pizza!
review_data.content: We've moved our offices to another part of the city and even after three years we come here from time to time. The pizzas and the pasta is very delicious. Antonio is a great host and waiting time is not long.

review_data.title: Great Italian lunch spot

review_data.title: Excellent Pizza
review_data.content: Antonio (the owner) is the heartbeat of this place. Excellent pizza and traditional Italian accompaniments. Very reasonable prices. You will never be disappointed.

review_data.title: Authentic and good quality Pizzas
